snippet.title: Life is Strange: True Colors Exclusive Gameplay - Future Games Show GamesCom 2021
snippet.description: Developers from Deck Nine debuted an exclusive segment from Life is Strange: True Colors during the Future Games Show at Gamescom. Life is Strange True Colors launches on PlayStation, Xbox, PC and Google Stadia on September 10, with a Nintendo Switch release coming later this year.
